checkInInstructions:
The front desk is open daily from 7 AM - 11 PM
The check-in location differs from the property location. To check in, go to 356 E Hanson Ranch Road
If you are planning to arrive after 10 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation.
firstHotelOverview: Situated in Vail, this condo is within a 5-minute walk of Cogswell Gallery and Vail Ski Resort. Gerald R. Ford Amphitheater and Betty Ford Alpine Gardens are also within 15 minutes.

hotelAmenitiesText.name: Property Amenities
hotelAmenitiesText.content:
In addition to an outdoor pool, Chateau Christiania provides ski-in/ski-out access and a health club. Wireless Internet access is complimentary. This Vail condo also offers tour/ticket assistance, barbecue grills, and ski storage. Onsite parking is available (surcharge).

Chateau Christiania is a smoke-free property.

  • Barbecue grill(s)
  • Picnic area
  • Ski storage
  • Ski-in/ski-out access
  • Luggage storage
  • Newspapers in lobby (surcharge)
  • Breakfast available (surcharge)
  • Concierge services
  • Front desk (limited hours)
  • Laundry facilities
  • Tours/ticket assistance
  • Total number of rooms - 8
  • Free WiFi
  • Self parking (surcharge)
  • Health club
  • Outdoor pool
  • Smoke-free property

hotelFeesText.name: Fees
hotelFeesText.content:
• The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Fee for continental breakfast: USD 15.00 per person (approximately)
    • Self parking fee: USD 30.00 per night
    • Crib (infant bed) fee: USD 25.00 per night
    • Rollaway bed fee: USD 35.00 per night
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

hotelMandatoryFeesText.name: Mandatory Fees and Taxes
hotelMandatoryFeesText.content:
• You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:
    • Resort fee: 6.00 percent of room rate
  • The resort fee includes:
    • Pool access
    • Spa tub access
    • Health club access
    • Fitness center access
    • Fitness/yoga classes
  • We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

hotelOverviewText.name: Location
hotelOverviewText.content: Situated in Vail, this condo is within a 5-minute walk of Cogswell Gallery and Vail Ski Resort. Gerald R. Ford Amphitheater and Betty Ford Alpine Gardens are also within 15 minutes.

hotelOverviewText.name: Property Features
hotelOverviewText.content: This smoke-free condo features ski-in/ski-out access, an outdoor pool, and a health club. WiFi in public areas is free. Other amenities include self parking, concierge services, and laundry facilities.

hotelOverviewText.name: Room Amenities
hotelOverviewText.content: All 8 condos have 2 bedrooms and feature free WiFi. Guests can enjoy fireplaces, and other standard amenities include kitchens with refrigerators and ovens.

hotelPoliciesText.name: Policies
hotelPoliciesText.content:
• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Pets not allowed
  • Check-in time starts at 4 PM
  • Check-in time ends at 11 PM
  • Check-out time is 11 AM
  • Minimum check-in age is 18
  • MasterCard
  • American Express
  • Visa
  • This property does not provide air conditioning. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.

longDescription: Location: Situated in Vail, this condo is within a 5-minute walk of Cogswell Gallery and Vail Ski Resort. Gerald R. Ford Amphitheater and Betty Ford Alpine Gardens are also within 15 minutes.
